pageContext.claim: “Looking back on history, who was treated worse, Alfonse Capone, legendary mob boss, killer and ‘Public Enemy Number One,’ or Paul Manafort, political operative & Reagan/Dole darling, now serving solitary confinement - although convicted of nothing? Where is the Russian Collusion?”
pageContext.analysis: Manafort was not serving solitary confinement while "convicted of nothing." A judge had revoked Manafort's bail pending trial because he had repeatedly violated bail conditions.
